verses.name: Ezekiel 23:1
verses.text: The word of the Lord came again unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:2
verses.text: Son of man, there were two women, the daughters of one mother:

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:3
verses.text: And they committed whoredoms in Egypt; they committed whoredoms in their youth: there were their breasts pressed, and there they bruised the teats of their virginity.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:4
verses.text: And the names of them were Aholah the elder, and Aholibah her sister: and they were mine, and they bare sons and daughters. Thus were their names; Samaria is Aholah, and Jerusalem Aholibah.
